data.title: DAY TRIP TO BROADWAY: Sunset Blvd.
data.meta_description: Join us on a day trip to New York City to see Sunset Blvd. on Broadway.
data.text:
Andrew Lloyd Webber’s “Sunset Blvd” on Broadway Starring Nicole Scherzinger

$325 (Members 10% discount), Front Mezzanine Seats

Fee includes transportation, show ticket, and bus gratuities.

Purchase tickets here

Note: Tickets purchased separately can request to sit together, but there’s no guarantee.

Haunted by her memories and dreams, silent movie star Norma Desmond yearns to return to the big screen. A struggling screenwriter who can’t sell his scripts to the Hollywood studios may be her only hope, until their dangerous and captivating relationship leads to disaster. Drenched in champagne and cynicism, SUNSET BLVD. focuses the lens on the ambitions and frustrations of its characters and puts their intoxicating need for fame and adoration in stark close-up. The New York Times declares, “This bravura new revival belongs to the here and now. Nicole Scherzinger gives a career-defining performance.” And The Washington Post hails, “This killer production is theater at its devilish best. It slays you.”

A sold out smash hit in London’s West End, you won’t want to miss this spectacular revival!

Please note: to receive a Member discount you MUST be registered with an online account. Not yet registered? Sign up here. All Membership discounts will be automatically applied after you login, enter registrant information, and add tickets to your cart.
